title: Queue log in
body:
Hello,
i wanna adress this post 2 rito itself.
Ima playing league now for 5 years, and was allways used to just press my champ, wait and log in automatically.
Now with the new system, this has been changed which is stupidly annoying. Since yesterday ive been kicked out of queue around 10 
times, just because i did not click explicitly ban or pick. please rito, why is it so hard to just choose a champ and after the time runs out
automatically log in.

replies.body:
1. The Champ select would take ages if everyone would wait for the timer.
2. There was a tip that said YOU HAVE TO LOCK IN.
3. How can you miss this 10 times?
